snippet: The vandalism came against a backdrop of concern in Germany about right-wing violence against ethnic minorities, as refugees pour into the country.
abstract: Berlin memorial honoring Gypsy victims of Holocaust is vandalized with spray-painted neo-Nazi message and symbol; federal police are investigating crime.
lead_paragraph: The vandalism came against a backdrop of concern in Germany about right-wing violence against ethnic minorities, as refugees pour into the country.

headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Europe; Germany: Memorial to Gypsy Victims of Holocaust Is Defaced in Berlin
headline.main: Memorial to Gypsy Victims of Holocaust Is Desecrated in Berlin
